Amazon is offering the Ninja Crispi 5-in-1 Portable Glass Air Fryer for $159 shipped in a green colorway, while the other colors on the same page bring 4-in-1 functionality for $1 higher. This newer model has only been on the Amazon marketplace for two months and normally runs $220 outside of discounts, of which we’ve seen the costs taken as low as $185 here, with Costco having had a one-time, short-lived cut to $125 with a membership back at the top of the month. Aside from that rate, you’re otherwise looking at the best price we have tracked and a new low price at Amazon, giving you $61 in savings while also upgrading your air frying game – especially with holiday feasts on the horizon.

items.title: Valve’s new VR streaming trick won’t just work with its own headset
items.summary: Valve’s new streaming-first VR headset — the Steam Frame — employs a clever trick to help make game streaming feel as low-latency as possible. It’s called foveated streaming, and it means the headset requests a higher-quality image for the content that’s right in front of your eyes while lowering the resolution of your peripheral vision to reduce […]

items.title: Valve is going big on hardware with all-new Steam Machine, Frames VR headset, and a controller
items.summary:
Following the success of Steam Deck, Valve is doubling down on the hardware department with a range of new hardware. Leading the pack is the all-new Steam Machine, which you’ll be able to pair with long-rumored VR headset called the Steam Frame. There’s also a brand-new Steam Controller to go with the new console, which you’ll be able to bundle with the console itself or buy separately. With these new additions joining the already popular Steam Deck, it’s safe to say that Valve is betting big on hardware, going head-to-head with the likes of Sony and Microsoft. Head below for a closer look and more details.
